title: New States Continental University
summary: New States Continental University (NSCU) is a private university headquartered in Belize City, Belize, with a campus in Delaware, USA and over 30 offshore campuses worldwide.

content.text: The New States Continental University (NSCU) is a registered private institution headquartered in Belize. It maintains an additional campus in Delaware, United States and is officially recognized by the Belize Ministry of Education.
NSCU has over 30 offshore campuses across micro-nations and small countries, including WLC College in India, Blue Lagoon University in Tuvalu, Coral Reef Institute in Kiribati, and others.
The university adheres to the standards set by the Belize Ministry of Education and is incorporated in compliance with the Delaware Division of Corporations.
